attributes.action: Declare current MPs an utterly useless waste of taxpayers money.
attributes.background:
The Brexit debacle is the perfect reflection of how utterly useless ALL the current MPs are. 
The British people, be they for Remain or Brexit, should now unite and force all members of Parliament to publicly declare themselves useless embarrassments to democracy.

rejection.details: It's not the role of the UK Government or Parliament to express views about individual MP's performance. MPs are accountable to their electorate.
